mapper.sql: homework_answer_id, homework_id, user_id, url, if_submit, remark_url, exp, class_id, create_date_time, modify_date_time
mapper.select: select count(homework_answer_id) from homework_answer where homework_id = #{homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and if_submit = '是' and exp is null

select homework_answer_id, if_submit, exp, user.avatar as user_avatar, user.name as user_name, user.sno as user_sno from homework_answer, user where homework_answer.user_id = user.user_id and homework_id = #{homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select homework_answer.homework_answer_id, homework.name as homework_name, homework.submit_num homework_submit_num, homework.exp homework_exp, homework.homework_status from homework, homework_answer where homework.homework_id = homework_answer.homework_id and homework_answer.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and homework_answer.class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and homework_status in('进行中', '评价中')

select homework_answer.homework_answer_id, homework.name as homework_name, homework.submit_num as homework_submit_num, homework.exp homework_exp, homework.homework_status from homework, homework_answer where homework.homework_id = homework_answer.homework_id and homework_answer.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and homework_answer.class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and homework_status = '已结束'

select homework_answer.homework_answer_id, homework_answer.detail, homework_answer.url, homework_answer.exp, homework_answer.remark, homework_answer.remark_url, homework.name as homework_name, homework.detail as homework_detail, homework.url as homework_url from homework, homework_answer where homework.homework_id = homework_answer.homework_id and homework_answer_id = #{homework_answer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into homework_answer (homework_answer_id, homework_id, user_id, url, if_submit, remark_url, exp, class_id, create_date_time, modify_date_time )values
(#{item.homework_answer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.if_submit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.class_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.create_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modify_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

homework_answer_id,
homework_id,
user_id,

if_submit,
remark_url,
exp,

remark,

mapper.update:
update homework_answer
homework_id = #{homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
if_submit = #{if_submit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark_url = #{remark_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp = #{exp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_id = #{class_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date_time = #{create_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date_time = #{modify_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where homework_answer_id = #{homework_answer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update homework_answer set homework_id = #{homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_submit = #{if_submit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_url = #{remark_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp = #{exp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_id = #{class_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date_time = #{create_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date_time = #{modify_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where homework_answer_id = #{homework_answer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update homework_answer set homework_id = #{homework_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_submit = #{if_submit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_url = #{remark_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp = #{exp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_id = #{class_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date_time = #{create_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date_time = #{modify_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where homework_answer_id = #{homework_answer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
